title: Introducing: Six Minutes Rewind!
description:
If you’d like to audition to be a special guest on Six Minutes Rewind, record a one-minute audio clip on a phone, tablet, or computer telling us your first name, where you’re from, and why you’d be great for our new Six Minutes Rewind show! Email that clip to jessica@gzmshows.com. If you’re under fourteen-years-old, you must ask your parents permission. Superfans can be any age though - more than a third of our listeners are adults! - so everyone is encouraged to audition!
For more great Gen-Z Media shows visit: http://gzmshows.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
